name: SYDNEY FLIGHT TRAINING PTY LTD.
about: Sydney Flight Training Pty Ltd is a premier aviation institution dedicated to providing exceptional pilot training in Sydney. Accredited by CASA and RAAus, our flight school offers a comprehensive range of courses, from Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL) and Private Pilot Licence (PPL) to Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) and advanced ratings such as Instrument Ratings and Multi-Engine endorsements. Our experienced and dedicated instructors ensure students receive top-notch training in a safe and supportive environment. With state-of-the-art facilities and a fleet of modern aircraft, we cater to both aspiring commercial pilots and private enthusiasts, ensuring each student achieves their piloting goals with confidence and excellence. At Sydney Flight Training, we are committed to delivering quality, flexible, and cost-effective aviation education, making your flying dreams a reality.
services:
["Recreational Pilot License
Private Pilot License
